attributes.action: Cancel SATS for both primary and secondary schools.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
SATS for primary schools is simply ridiculous. Though the excuse is that it helps prepare students, I have seen no benefit.

SATS for secondary school are also, for want of a better word, useless.
The SATS are basically a way for schools to look good, with good results.
It does not help, and those students who do want to do well, end up stressed and feel overworked.
